full_summary:
=================
### Government Tender Announcement: Electrical Warehouse Tractor

#### Tender Title and Reference Number

* **Electrical Warehouse Tractor**: Request for Proposal (RFP) to procure Electric Warehouse Tractors.
* **Solicitation Number**: W8476-226573/B
* **Reference Number**: cb-851-75866073

#### Tender Status

This tender has expired on November 8, 2023 at 2:00PM EST. 

#### Requirement Description

The Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking to procure Qty 2x Electric Warehouse Tractors for delivery to Montreal, Quebec. The requested delivery date is 180 days from the date of contract.

#### Tender Details

* **Delivery Location**: CDSB Montréal, Montreal, Quebec
* **Delivery Date**: 180 days from the date of contract
* **Security Requirement**: None
* **Trade Agreements**: This tender is subject to the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), and Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, and Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement.
* **Expected Contract Duration**: 210 days (from November 30, 2023 to September 30, 2024)

#### Evaluation Criteria

The Department of National Defence will evaluate and select the bid proposal based on the Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price.

#### Contact Information

For any inquiries or clarifications, please contact:

* Genevieve Roach
* Email: [genevieve.roach@forces.gc.ca](mailto:genevieve.roach@forces.gc.ca)
* Phone: (000) 000-0000
* Address: National Defence, 101 Colonel By Drive, Ottawa, ON K1A 0K2

#### Document and Attachment

The tender notice and RFP documents can be downloaded from [CanadaBuys](https://canadabuys.canada.ca). Please refer to the attached documents:

* RFP Document (English): [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/20930/w8476-226573-b-en-rfp-original.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/20930/w8476-226573-b-en-rfp-original.pdf)
* RFP Amendment 1 (English): [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files
